description: This file defines the FireCrawlKnowledgeBase class, which extends AgentKnowledge, and provides methods to scrape URLs using Firecrawl, both synchronously and asynchronously, yielding lists of Document objects.

classes.name: FireCrawlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class that manages knowledge base of URLs and provides methods to scrape documents synchronously and asynchronously using Firecrawl.

methods.name: document_lists
methods.description: Property that yields lists of documents by scraping URLs synchronously.

methods.name: async_document_lists
methods.description: Asynchronous property that yields lists of documents by scraping URLs asynchronously.
